title: The Importance of an Open Camera System Demonstrated with Wide-ranging Applications of MerlinEM, Hybrid Pixel Direct Electron Detector for Scanning Transmission Electron Microscopy
content: MerlinEM detector was developed as a collaboration between the University of Glasgow and Quantum Detectors Ltd. The Merlin readout system for the Medipix3 chips was first designed for synchrotron applications [1] and offered various ways of integration through hardware and software means. This property helped with the integrability of the system and it is one of the reasons it has been widely accepted for direct electron detection in the transmission electron microscopy community.
